column1: A Graveside Service is planned for Tuesday June 16

column3: NM. Pastor Randy Steele will officiate. Pallbearers will be Roger Young and Steven Young. The family would like to thank the Nursing Staff and Doctors at Lovelace Womenï¿½s Hospital for all their support during this time for our family.
